鮮剝.definition: (of fruit, prawns etc) freshly peeled; Taiwan pr. [xian1bo1]

鮮卑.definition: Xianbei or Xianbi, group of northern nomadic peoples

鮮卑族.definition: Xianbei or Xianbi, historic ethnic group of northern nomads

鮮味.definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)

鮮明.definition: (of colors) bright; fresh and clear; clear-cut; distinct

鮮橙多.definition: Xianchengduo, Chinese brand of orange-flavored soft drink

鮮活.definition: vivid; lively; (of food ingredients) live or fresh

鮮為人知.definition: rarely known to anyone (idiom); almost unknown; secret to all but a few

鮮花插在牛糞上.pinyin: xian1 hua1 cha1 zai4 niu2 fen4 shang4
鮮花插在牛糞上.definition: lit. a bunch of flowers poked into a pile of manure; fig. a terrible shame (as when a lovely woman marries an odious man)

鮮血淋漓.definition: (idiom) drenched with blood; dripping with blood

鮮貨.definition: produce; fresh fruits and vegetables; fresh aquatic food; fresh herbs
